citation.article-title: Description of Paralactobacillus selangorensis gen. nov., sp. nov., a new lactic acid bacterium isolated from chili bo, a Malaysian food ingredient.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Paralactobacillus selangorensis sp. nov.
Paralactobacillus selangorensis (sel.an.gor'en.sis. M.L. adj. selangorensis belonging to the province of Selangor, Malaysia)
Description of species as for genus.
The characteristics of LMG 17710T correspond to those of the species except that acid is produced from D-tagatose, in contrast to other strains.
